body.name: Boppy Shopping Cart and High Chair Cover, Sunshine Yellow and Gray Chevron with Changeable SlideLine Sun Book Toy, Plush Comfort with 2-point Safety Belt, Wipeable and Machine Washable, 6-48 Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
features: 360-DEGREE COVERAGE: The Boppy Shopping Cart and Highchair Cover provides all-around coverage for most shopping carts and restaurant highchairs
ENTERTAINMENT FOR BABY: The cover’s SlideLine has an attached toy or you can swap it out, so baby’s favorite toy or pacifier is always within reach, keeping baby entertained and toys off the floor
COMFORT AND SAFETY: 2-point safety straps to keep your baby secure and includes extra padding to keep your baby comfy while out and about
EASY CARE, MACHINE WASHABLE: Easy-wipe fabric and machine washable because babies put their mouths on everything
body.description: All-around coverage when shopping or dining out. Make outings with baby worry-free with the Boppy Shopping Cart and Highchair Cover. 360-degree coverage keeps baby comfy while adding a barrier between baby and those public use shopping carts and highchairs. Fully padded, any potential pinches or scratchy spots on the cart are covered. A SlideLine toy loop runs along the front of the cover to provide easy-to-reach entertainment for baby and keeps toys off the floor while shopping or dining out. This cover comes with a soft toy attached, and you can easily swap it out for a favorite toy or pacifier to keep baby occupied, giving you a few more moments for errands or lunch. The 2-point safety belt and elastic corners keep both baby and the cover in place. You can shop confidently knowing that the Boppy Shopping Cart and Highchair Cover passes all U.S. safety standards and fits most shopping carts and restaurant highchairs. The easy-wipe fabric keeps things clean between uses and is machine washable. Recommended age: 6 - 48 months

productInformation.name: Material free
productInformation.value: ‎Formaldehyde Free, Phthalate Free, Flame Retardant Free, Free of Heavy Metals, Lead Free, California Prop 65- Meets all chemical regulations and requirements for children’s products at a federal, state, and local level. *Tested by a third party CPSC Accredited lab.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎No special equipment required. Machine wash with mild detergent, delicate cycle 30C (65 - 85F). Do not bleach. Drip dry, hanging in shade. Do not squeeze. Do not iron. Do not dry clean. Toys: spot clean only. Air dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love this seat cover! It’s adorable , fits pretty much any cart or high chair we’ve tried, and is way comfier for the baby. The little carrot toy is a nice touch too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars By far, my favorite shopping cover!
reviews.reviewText: Anytime we go shopping, I bring this along. It’s large enough to fit the shopping cart. It’s also pretty thick which gives more of a cozy feel while my son rides in the shopping cart. I highly recommend this cover!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical, functional, and amazing!
reviews.reviewText: When searching for a high chair cover I came across this at my local store. I particularly wanted a high chair only cover not a universal one since my daughter is always in her stroller when at the store. I assumed this would be difficult to use and convert to a high chair cover, and boy was I wrong! This is the BEST cover. It easily sits on a high chair with no fuss, with 3 children it is difficult with a toddler and a 10 month old trying to get everyone situated at a restaurant especially with one hand! I can easily put this in her chair one handed, and get her in and out quickly if needed.As for the shopping cart cover part, I never thought I would use it and once again I was wrong! She loves riding in the cart when my toddler is not with us. She plays with the book and loves to get things out of the cart to examine. We can finally shop with ease knowing she is not getting germs! The size is PERFECT for BJ's, Costco size buggy's and even Target or Publix. It fits all carts with no problem. The best part about the shopping cart cover part is that it does not tie down (it has an elastic band that helps it stay on) so when you are one handed once again you can easily slide this on the cart. I had an Eddie Bauer one with my 3 year old that you had to tie to get it on the cart, which is impossible to do holding a baby! I would recommend this to any parent or mom that is looking for a practical, functioning, easy to use cover. When this cover is not in use we put it in a tote in my car to keep it clean and easy to access so it is not laying all over the floor getting stepped on. I love this item and can not say enough about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have
reviews.reviewText: This is great! It easily goes on high chairs and shopping carts. Keeps my 12 mo granddaughter safe from germs when we are out and about! Goes right into the wash when we get home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this item. It's adorable. But, I find myself fighting with the buckle and clasp, which routinely slips around and off the strap. It does have a nice fit over the cart and is easy to clean, but I feel like I should've gone with a grocery cover that came with a pillow insert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly what I expected. Works for the shopping cart as well as the high chairs in restaurants. High quality fabric that will last until next baby comes along.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute and comfy for your tot
reviews.reviewText: This is adorable but also like how it is comfortable and protects from some of those rusty dusty carts. Also if you give your child a snack or something there is a good chance this cover will catch it! Would recommend especially for a gift or something to add to your registry!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i take this thing everywhere!!! help keeps my baby distracted while i grocery shop/eat. also helps stay away from all those nasty germs on carts or high chairs at restaurants

Es de buena calidad, lavable en lavadora, solo no me atrevería a meterlo a la secadora porque la tela no es algodón y se puede quemar (me dio esa impresión). Yo lo colgué en sombra y seco rapidísimo. Cabe en en todos los carritos de súper donde lo he puesto. (Costco, Sams, Waltmart, etc). Está acolchado por el reverso, pero creo que le pudieron poner un poco más de acolchado ya que se logran sentir las rejas de los asientos. Así que yo le pongo un acolchado extra exactamente dónde se sienta.

Ayuda mucho a proteger a tu bebé del contacto con superficies sucias. Es acolchado, sirve para carritos de súper grandes y para todo tipo de periquera. Nos preguntan mucho por ella en los restaurantes. No se ha manchado a pesar de toda la comida que le cae. 🫣
A mi beba le gustó mucho. Esta muy cómodo al parecer y se la paso de maravilla durante las compras. Fue la sensación
La cubierta está hecha de muy buenos materiales relación costo - precioEs utilizable en sillas periqueras de restaurante, carritos de súper etc
Muy bueno. Su calidad es buena , ya se utilizó y la verdad ayuda mucho
